languages.text: "Интересная манера представляться первым предложенным именем". {n}Хейнрикс окидывает обстановку подчеркнуто небрежным взглядом.{/n} "Посмотрим, как долго вы сможете морочить им головы".

traits.locale_text: "Интересная манера представляться первым предложенным именем". {n}Хейнрикс окидывает обстановку подчеркнуто небрежным взглядом.{/n} "Посмотрим, как долго вы сможете морочить им головы".

languages.text: "A curious habit, introducing yourself with the first name offered to you." {n}Heinrix glances around with pointed nonchalance.{/n} "Let's see how long you can keep up the ruse."
languages.original_text: "Интересная манера представляться первым предложенным именем". {n}Хейнрикс окидывает обстановку подчеркнуто небрежным взглядом.{/n} "Посмотрим, как долго вы сможете морочить им головы".

traits.locale_text: "A curious habit — to introduce yourself by using the first name provided to you." {n}Heinrix glances around with pointed nonchalance.{/n} "Let's see how long you can keep them in the dark."
"A curious habit — to introduce yourself by using the first name provided to you." {n}Heinrix glances around with pointed nonchalance.{/n} "Let's see how long you can keep them in the dark."
"A curious habit, introducing yourself with the first name offered to you." {n}Heinrix glances around with pointed nonchalance.{/n} "Let's see how long you can keep up the ruse."
"A curious habit, introducing yourself with the first name offered to you." {n}Heinrix glances around with pointed nonchalance.{/n} "Let's see how long you can keep up the ruse."
"A curious habit, introducing yourself with the first name offered to you." {n}Heinrix glances around with pointed nonchalance.{/n} "Let's see how long you can keep up the ruse."

languages.text: “听到别人说什么名字，就谎称自己是什么名字，真是个不同寻常的习惯。”{n}海因里希以不冷不热的锐利目光扫视着四周。{/n}“咱们来看看你的把戏什么时候会被拆穿。”
languages.original_text: "A curious habit, introducing yourself with the first name offered to you." {n}Heinrix glances around with pointed nonchalance.{/n} "Let's see how long you can keep up the ruse."

traits.locale_text: “听到别人说什么名字，就谎称自己是什么名字，真是个不同寻常的习惯。”{n}海因里希以不冷不热的锐利目光扫视着四周。{/n}“咱们来看看你的把戏什么时候会被拆穿。”

languages.text: «Presentarse con el primer nombre que se le ofrece es una costumbre curiosa». {n}Heinrix mira alrededor con una indiferencia mordaz.{/n} «Veamos cuánto dura el engaño».
languages.original_text: "A curious habit, introducing yourself with the first name offered to you." {n}Heinrix glances around with pointed nonchalance.{/n} "Let's see how long you can keep up the ruse."

traits.locale_text: «Presentarse con el primer nombre que se le ofrece es una costumbre curiosa». {n}Heinrix mira alrededor con una indiferencia mordaz.{/n} «Veamos cuánto dura el engaño».

languages.text: 「最初に提示された名前で自己紹介するとは、なんとも不思議な習慣だな」{n}ハインリックスは冷たく、淡々とした表情で周囲を見渡す。{/n}「いつまで誤魔化し続けられるか見ものだ」
languages.original_text: "A curious habit, introducing yourself with the first name offered to you." {n}Heinrix glances around with pointed nonchalance.{/n} "Let's see how long you can keep up the ruse."

traits.locale_text: 「最初に提示された名前で自己紹介するとは、なんとも不思議な習慣だな」{n}ハインリックスは冷たく、淡々とした表情で周囲を見渡す。{/n}「いつまで誤魔化し続けられるか見ものだ」

languages.text: "Eine eigentümliche Angewohnheit, sich mit dem ersten Namen vorzustellen, der einem angeboten wird." {n}Heinrix blickt sich bewusst unbekümmert um.{/n} "Mal sehen, wie lange Ihr die Scharade aufrechterhalten könnt."
languages.original_text: "A curious habit, introducing yourself with the first name offered to you." {n}Heinrix glances around with pointed nonchalance.{/n} "Let's see how long you can keep up the ruse."

traits.locale_text: "Eine eigentümliche Angewohnheit, sich mit dem ersten Namen vorzustellen, der einem angeboten wird." {n}Heinrix blickt sich bewusst unbekümmert um.{/n} "Mal sehen, wie lange Ihr die Scharade aufrechterhalten könnt."

languages.text: « Quelle drôle d'habitude que de se présenter avec le premier nom que l'on mentionne devant vous... Voyons combien de temps vous parviendrez à tenir le masque, » {n}déclare Heinrix en regardant autour de lui avec une nonchalance outrancière.{/n}
languages.original_text: "A curious habit, introducing yourself with the first name offered to you." {n}Heinrix glances around with pointed nonchalance.{/n} "Let's see how long you can keep up the ruse."

traits.locale_text: « Quelle drôle d'habitude que de se présenter avec le premier nom que l'on mentionne devant vous... Voyons combien de temps vous parviendrez à tenir le masque, » {n}déclare Heinrix en regardant autour de lui avec une nonchalance outrancière.{/n}

languages.text: "Kendini sana zikredilen ilk isimle tanıtman tuhaf bir huy." {n}Heinrix, kesin bir kayıtsızlıkla etrafa bakınıyor.{/n} "Bakalım bu dolabı ne kadar sürdürebileceksin."
languages.original_text: "A curious habit, introducing yourself with the first name offered to you." {n}Heinrix glances around with pointed nonchalance.{/n} "Let's see how long you can keep up the ruse."

traits.locale_text: "Hitap edildiğin ilk ismi hemen benimsemen ne tuhaf bir huy." {n}Heinrix, kesin bir kayıtsızlıkla etrafa bakınıyor.{/n} "Bakalım bu katakulliyi ne kadar sürdürebileceksin."
